name: Sunrise Awakening Yoga
level: This is a gentle class suitable for Beginners (Level 0) All Levels
description1: In this easy-going but energizing practise, we will work out the kinks, wake up your breathe and find some mindful movement.
description2: We will explore some gentle but purposeful sequences, build a little heat and release into some feel-good stretches.
description3: This class will end with a meditation to help you arrive fully present at the beginning of your day.
location: The Yoga Rooms, 1, 483 Barlow Moor Rd, Chorlton, M21 8AG

name: Evening Flow Yoga
level: This is a physical class suitable for Intermediate (Level 2)
description1: In this flow practice, we will work out the kinks, wake up your breathe and find some mindful movement.
description2: We will explore some flow sequences, getting the heartbeat up followed by a wind down at the end.
description3: Yoga Flow becomes a moving meditation that creates strength, freedom and fluidity in the body and mind.
location: Space at the Mill, 2nd floor, Wellington Mill, Duke St, Manchester M3 4NF
